name: class-mixins
description: A real mixin tool that works with class hierarchy.

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs --target es2015 --sourceMap true --declaration true --noImplicitThis true --noImplicitAny true index.ts
scripts.postpublish: ls index.* | grep -v index.ts | xargs rm -f

author: A-yon Lee <i@hyurl.com>
